column4: would anyone know why i have a much weaker connection to my LAN when using ubuntu as opposed to running windows xp from the same machine?
i find the oposite, i have much more speed with ubuntu, on the net, than with windows
it may be a plugin for FireFoz that is hampering you.
i'm not using any plugins in firefox, currently i trying to run 8.04 from the live cd to see if any results change
